normal.intro: hey üëã! i'm ryan, a third year cs student, previously also a ta @ ubc cs and software engineer intern at planview working on
normal.description: , a multi-agent ai assistant integrated into planview's software product suite! i'm incredibly passionate about building robust and efficient systems that make a difference, solving tough problems, learning fast, and having fun along the way!
normal.hobbiesIntro: otherwise, i'm also into f1, english football (liverpool supporter), sports cars, video editing, mechanical keyboards (topre), and games.
normal.closing: to read more about the things i'm into! feel free to connect, i'm always down for a good chat. thanks for visiting, talk soon!

items.description: i love the cross section of engineering, sport, and speed. unfortunately, i support ferarri.
i primarily follow the premier league and european football, though i also keep up with international games and the mls. i support liverpool (rip jota ‚ù§Ô∏è).
i hope to own and maintain a clean nb or nc miata in the near future. into any cars that are cool.
i've run mini-itx builds since i first got into pcs. currently running a 5600x and a 3070.
vegas pro user since 2018. made montages, school projects, funny short-form videos, and more.

i primarily use a realforce r3s (45g topre) which i got when i was visiting japan in 2025. i have a few other custom boards with more traditional cherry style switches, both soldered and hot-swappable.
currently enjoying valorant, peak with friends, gta v while waiting for gta vi. previously played overwatch, fortnite, minecraft, fifa, f1.
girlfriend got me back back into pokemon tcg. collection isn't great but i have a few cool cards. also used to play a lot of pokemon go.
